column5: After looking at so many different boats and styles,we have our new boat to us. Took it for a water test drive,very comfortable.The mrs,s is happy which means I am happy.LOL  The whole package was drop in and go.Nothing to buy for it.   3.0 Merc with Cobra outdrive New Garmin 178C GPS/Fish finder with Ontario lakes bluechart card New Uniden UM525 VHF/DSC radio with new Glomex VHF antenna New KOSS AM/FM CD radio Built in swim platform with ladder Pump out toilet Built in spot light Newly recovered cuddy cushions Two anchors Camper top Shorelander EZ Load trailer with new tires, bearing buddies, new marker lights, and some new rollers All safety gear included 2 adult life jackets
Looks good Brian. I see there is no bow mount seat for Terry though.
Congrats Brian, but you're gonna look funny flippin' the pads in that thing....
Nice rig.  Far from what you have been looking at if I recall correctly?  I too thought where's the bow mount, but a boat like that doesn't get used for fishing much  Congrats
I got one word for ya,,,,,,,,,,,RIGGERS.
That's awesome Brian, nice looking ride.  I'm sure you and Betty will get years of enjoyment in that.  I like the onboard "facilities" too  Joey
Brian's getting old.....
nice looking boat
Well it ain't no tiller but it'll do I guess. Congrats to you and Betty, me son!
Now that's a fine lookin' boat!
Nice boat bro are you going to get a slip or tow it around a set of riggers would be a good add on  Rob
Nice job Brian.  Will see you out on the lake. Stay away from my spot.
Nice lookin' craft there, Brian.  Congratulations to you and BettyAnn.
Very nice Brian, I'm sure you and Betty will get lots of enjoyment out of it...  Maureen

Thanks all.Bettys still all smiles.       Hey bro. For this year ,were just going to trailer it down to the lake and travel up to Couch and Sparrow.Stay at a few of the other marinas . We will be apply for a slip come next January.     AHHHHHHHHHHH OK.LOL
That's a beautiful boat Brian!!!   You should get a couple pretty nice Ski's with that thing!!!            ... not this kind:                   .. this kind!
Mrs,s wants a tube. When I look back,I can say,WOW,when did she fall off? HAHAHAHAHAHA
we will keep an eye out for you ! Congrats on the ship ! TB

I can see the riggers on there now........and the rod holders, rods, nets, lures,.........I thought you said it came with everything  Nice rig for cruisin around though, you guys will have lots of fun in that.  s.
Great looking ride Brian     Congratulations I'm sure she'll give you lots of enjoyable time out on the water!!! Jacques

Nice ride Brian not what I thought you would end up with kinda like Bill said she will be hell in 3' and weeds LOL.  I think you have been reading to many reports from down this way where the guys head out with the rods,big lures nets and BBQ and full menu of steak potatoes and pop nothing worse then sitting down to a big meal and a rod goes off now everyone is fighting to be the one not on that rod.  Enjoy it she sure looks sturdy and fun
Heres a hint bud get her a silver swimsuit and fish hook earrings to wear while tubing......  Really nice boat it looks like a great choice for the small and larger lakes around you.   Art

Thanks again all.  I have gone from a 12ft tinny to a 14 to a bass boat.Had my fun,lived a dream. The oprative word is "my".  Now it,s time for her. She was very surprised when I said lets look for somthing like this. After fishing with Terry a couple weeks ago,I came home and said I want a bass boat again. She said what ever you want.I was joking of course. The circle of life has come around.  WE,,,,,NO,,,,WERE, AS HAPPY AS HAPPY CAN BE.  And yes,she said I can put downrigger on it.LOL  Like she had a choice.LOL  BTW,SMALLIES ARE STILL GOING TO GET CAUGHT.
As long as you're both happy, that's all that counts, enjoy, lifes short and you never get a second chance.  Now get some slimy critters in there and make it smell funky.
